Index >  SelectionImageBorderColor

SelectionImageBorderColor

Description

Returns or sets the border color of the selected image. It is a value specifying the 24-bit RGB value.

Data type

<int>

Syntax

.SelectionImageBorderColor = 0xffffff;

Remarks

Default is white (0xffffff). The byte-ordering of the 24-bit RGB value is BBGGRR. BB represents blue, GG represents green and RR represents red.
